"Hello, hello! Things are busy as ever y: "Hmm hmm... Lisa's opinion of that cat creature?"
"Actually, Lisa isn't quite sure, you know?"
"But if he joined Lisa to go bully some enemies, she might be able to think of something, you know?"
"It'd be nice if you could relay that to the cat creature, you know? Anyways, byebyebyebyebye!"
"Ranger and Gunner are nice, you know? They let you shoot and shoot and shoot so you can kill LOTS of those pesky enemies, you know?"
"Rifles, Launchers, Twin Machineguns... Each and every one is precious, you know? Hehe. Hehehe. Hehehehehe."
"Oh, hello! You've returned!"
"Lisa is happy, so she'll give you this, you know?"
"You will take it, won't you?"
"Lisa doesn't need any thanks. She wouldn't know what to do with it."
"Please use that well! ... And survive long enough for us to see each other again."
"Hehe. Hehehehehe."
"Received \"Synthesizer\" from Lisa."
"Received \"Synthesizer\" from Lisa."
"Received \"Synthesizer\" from Lisa."
"Received \"Sneak Shooter\" from Lisa."
"Received \"Synthesizer\" from Lisa."
"Received \"Synthesizer\" from Lisa."
"Received \"Synthesizer\" from Lisa."
"Received \"Piercing Shell\" from Lisa."
"Received \"Synthesizer\" from Lisa."
"Received \"Synthesizer\" from Lisa."
"Received \"<%skit_text>\" from Lisa."
"Hello. Lisa's having a little rest, you know? As you can see. Hehe."
"Sniping is hard work, it is! That's why resting is important. Hehe. Hehehehe."
"All sorts of enemies have weak points, yes? If you drive all your attacks into an enemy's weak point, they stop breathing really quickly."
"Anyone who'd talk to Lisa would have to be absolutely out of their mind. So... That means you're quite weird."
"Not too long ago, Lisa was very different. She was actually quite a shy girl, you know."
"What happened, you may ask? ... Well, every young lady has her secrets. Hehe. Hehehe."
"Lisa doesn't want to die or anything, but she has often thought about what it would be like, you know?"
"You only get to live one life at a time, you know? Lisa looks forward to her next one!"
"Does Lisa look like she lives all that recklessly? Lisa just does what she thinks is fun."
"Hehe. Lisa has lots of fun talking to you! Lisa hasn't felt this way in a while."
"Do you ever think about what you'll do when this is all over? When Lisa thinks about it, it's depressing."
"Lisa doesn't really think about anything except killing enemies, you know? When this is all over, there'll be no enemies to kill!"
"There's still hardly any information about Darkers but for some reason when ARKS captures them, they don't examine them."
"Maybe they're afraid to? Or maybe... they don't need to? Either way, it's quite the mystery."
"There are times when Lisa loses her way, you know. But, it's times like those when she does what she wants to do most."
"Lisa doesn't have to worry about anything at all, you know? She can just go and kill."
"When did Lisa take a liking to Ranger, you ask? That's a strange question, you know?"
"It's not a very interesting story, but since it's you who's asking, Lisa will tell you all about it!"
"It was when Lisa was a little girl. Pure, innocent Lisa was playing with her toy guns as she usually did, you know?"
"But then! Something came out of one of the guns for some reason, even though it was just a toy! That's when Lisa... stopped playing pretend."
"You see, Rangers have an innate ability to fire their photon energy out like bullets, you know? And so, that's how Lisa went on a shooting spree with just a toy gun."
"What happened to the people Lisa shot? Hehe. Why would Lisa know something like that?"
"Lisa just remembers that it gave her a REALLY nice feeling, you know?"
"Awww, Lisa is bummed out! She wanted to play with that Dark Falz some more..."
"Well, he sort of looked like he was having fun too, so he'll probably show up again."
"There it is. Mister rampaging dragon! Actually, it's pretty moderate as far as rampages go, you know?"
"If you ask Lisa, that's not even a mild temper tantrum. You should try applying yourself more, you know?"
"A fight club... That's got a nice ring to it. A competition of battle prowess, you know?"
"Meaning everyone shows off their best kill strategies. Hehehe. Lisa can't wait, you know?"
"Planet Wopal, was it? It's a curious place, you know?"
"For some reason Lisa feels a bit guilty about destroying everything. Doesn't stop her, though."
"Those dragon altars are a bit tricky for Lisa, you know?"
"When Lisa shoots everything with reckless abandon, they only really get angry when their valuables are destroyed."
"But they don't get nearly as frothing with rage if everything else is destroyed, so it's kind of boring, you know?"
"Something about planet Lillipa is different recently, you know?"
"Both ARKS and Darkers have become a lot more active there. Hehehe. Lisa's getting kind of excited about it."
"Who knows what will happen? Whatever it is, Lisa looks forward to it."
"The Seabed of Planet Wopal, was it? ... Lisa doesn't like that place, you know?"
"Lisa can't explain why, but she has a very bad feeling about that place. It's quite upsetting, you know?"
"Lisa actually tries to be careful when she's there! Are you impressed? You should be proud of her!"
"Something big is about to happen. Lisa can feel it in her circuits!"
"Lisa's not sure what it is, but she definitely knows when a storm is brewing. Hehehehe."
"Lisa likes it when she can cut loose. When she can shoot and shoot and shoot and shoot all sorts of things."
"Oh? Oh? Oh my, my! It's good to see you're alright, you know? What a comeback you made!"
"Fighting with you was really, really inspiring, you know? Lisa would like to do that again sometime."
"Lisa and friends have been pretty busy around here, you know?"
"Planet Harkotan, was it? Hmm... Oh, that one. Lisa really likes it there, you know?"
"Mainly because of all the big enemies. Lisa likes going in guns blazing."
"The culture and civilization? What's that? Can Lisa shoot it?!"
"The Floating Facility of Wopal? Lisa doesn't go there. It's kind of boring."
"The archaeologists would give Lisa a hard time if she just went around shooting the place up, you know?"
"Lisa would much rather go to a place where she could light the area up without worrying about it, you know? Hehe. Hehehehe."
"Everyone's so fixated on Harkotan and [Double], you know? Lisa... not so much."
"There's got to be a WAY stranger enemy or a WAY creepier place, you know?"
"That right there is what's really been on Lisa's mind. So, what about you?"
"Lisa thinks the Corrupted Areas are way more interesting than Dark Falz."
"They are areas with REALLY strong enemies; perfect places to unload your entire arsenal and then some, you know?"
"Hehe. Sounds fun, right? Lisa's just happy she has a place where she can shoot and shoot and shoot and shoot, you know?"
"[Double]... [Apprentice]... The problems just keep piling up, you know?"
"Well, it's a Darker, so Lisa will just enjoy shooting it LOTS and LOTS of times, you know?"
"Lisa is happiest when she is raining absolute hell down her enemies, you know?"
"Oh, hello hello! That was pretty intense, you know? It's good you weren't hurt too bad."
"Well actually, if you ask Lisa, being eaten by Dark Falz is kind of an honour, you know?"
"Because it means you must have killed lots and lots of enemies. Lisa's actually kind of jealous, you know?"
"Oh my my my my! Lisa heard what happened! It's a good thing you're okay, you know?"
"Well now, things have gotten pretty hectic, but I wonder what will happen, you know?"
"Oh, Lisa was trying to sleep. Say... If Lisa can't sleep, can she put something else to sleep? You know. Permanently."
"Well well well well now! This is gonna be a big fight. Hehehe. It's exciting, you know?"
"So many enemies... Lisa's going full tilt for this, you know?"
"Hehehe. Hehe. Lisa can hardly wait anymore. She really wants to shoot some enemies, you know?"
"Oh, oh my my my! Hello hello! Good to see you aren't dead."
"Lisa couldn't have expected anything else. Lisa's really quite happy. She had lots of fun, you know?"
"It's been a while since Lisa mercilessly slaughtered that many enemies. That was really fun, you know?"
"Lisa heard there's been changes in administration, but Lisa doesn't care about that stuff."
"Lisa's way more interested in finding ways to destroy enemies, you know?"
"Oh? Oh my my! How strange... Shouldn't the person in front of Lisa be sleeping right now?"
"Oh, but but but... what a beautiful way of sleeping, you know?"
"So how was it? Cold sleep, that is. Lisa thinks it must have gone by in a split second."
"My my, Lisa is so very jealous! You've gotten mixed up in something quite spectacular, you know?"
"Please let Lisa in on that! There's probably lots of things to shoot and shoot and shoot and KILL, you know?"
"Oh. Where would Lisa be stationed? Hehehe. Lisa probably shouldn't even bother asking, should she?"
"What Lisa's REALLY interested in is that group that came from Earth! Lisa wants to try shooting them. Hehehe."
"Lisa wonders what it would feel like to shoot them, you know? Hehehehe. That's what's been on Lisa's mind."
"Oh, don't look at Lisa like that! It's okay! Lisa only shoots when authorized."
"But! If Lisa WAS authorized, she'd definitely want to try shooting them. It would probably feel wonderful!"
"Lisa's actually found explosives to be quite wonderful lately, you know?"
"Of course, nothing tops driving bullets into skulls, but there's something quite charming about deconstructing someone on a molecular level."
"Oh yes, Lisa's definitely wants to try it. If you find anyone who looks like they'd blow up nicely, please do give Lisa a call!"
"Anyone who treats ARKS with hostility must be met with hostility in kind. That's what Lisa thinks!"
"When one side thinks that they are right and everyone else is wrong, the fight's already begun. No point in holding back, you know?"
"That's when Lisa starts thinking about who would feel the best to shoot. Hehe. Hehehehe."
"Lisa was on the Ship when it was attacked, but she wasn't allowed to go to where all the fighting was."
"The enemies were right here, you know?! It was the perfect time for a fight! What a letdown."
"Who cares if the martial law limiters weren't released? If Lisa can't shoot her guns, then she'll just start punching! Hehehehe."
"Hmm. Hmm! So... Phantoms are a new species that took on the form of Darkers?"
"While that sounds like it'd be hard to tell which is Darker and which is Phantom, it's actually quite easy."
"You can tell by shooting them! Each one feels different to shoot at, you know? Hehehe."
"Evolution is quite interesting. But how exactly does evolution take place, you know?"
"Is it based on what one wants? Or maybe what one doesn't want? That's just selfish, you know?"
"Lisa's thinking too much. Lisa likes doing fun things instead of thinking about confusing things."
"What does Lisa do for fun, you ask? You should know that by now, you know? Hehe. Hehehehe."
"Hmmm. Hmmmm... Ah, it's you. How are things?"
"Oh, Lisa's just worried about something. Don't worry, it doesn't have anything to do with you."
"Anyways, are you all ready? Keep in mind that normal tactics won't work on these guys. Think outside the box. "
"Nobody has to tell Lisa anything for her to know that this has become quite an odd situation."
"If there are no Darkers left... What will Lisa shoot then? How conflicting, you know?"
"You wouldn't happen to know of anything that might soon deserve to be shot, would you?"
"Hmm? HMMM? Oh my my my! You're on your way to go kill something, aren't you?"
"Lisa can tell, you know? You have a peculiar look about you."
"So what are you doing? Is it going to be really dangerous?"
"Well, it probably has nothing to do with Lisa. Hmmm. Or... perhaps it does, you know?"
